## Plan your visit

## Admission is free.

We want everyone to have access to art and the opportunity to learn from it. By not charging an entry fee, we hope to make our museum more accessible to a wider range of people. We rely on the generosity of our visitors to help us continue to provide high-quality exhibitions and programming. Your support allows us to continue to share art with our community and beyond.

admission_text:
## Memberships

## Engaging with the arts is essential to human experience.

For over 75 years, the South Bend Museum of Art has provided art experiences at low or no cost to all who want to partake. The arts are a catalyst for self-reflection, challenging participants with different points of view, and compelling them to empathize with others. SBMA is poised to serve adults and youth with creative and stimulating experiences, be it through our hands-on educational programs, diverse exhibitions, or strong experiential events and classes. Artists also find strong support from SBMA through exhibition and sales opportunities, making the South Bend Museum of Art the community’s one-stop provider for immersion in the visual arts.

## Benefits

  * __ As a member of SBMA, you will receive a discount on our classes through our studio program.

  * __ Members are the first to experience new exhibitions and be invited to our events.

  * __ With our premier and patron level, members are able to receive reciprocal benefits to over 900 museums across the nation and abroad.
